item.title: Null font
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I’m trying to get a font to use for my application, but no matter which font I use, it’s always null.

Font font = Font.getFont(Font.MONOSPACED);
System.out.println(font);
font = Font.getFont("Arial");
System.out.println(font);
for(String name : GraphicsEnvironment.getLocalGraphicsEnvironment().getAvailableFontFamilyNames()) {
    System.out.println(name);
}

Output:

null null ... Arial ... Monospaced ...

Am I missing a step somewhere?
